name: Hoang Duong Hotel
address: 44 Nguyen Truong To, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Nestled in the heart of Ba Dinh District, Hoang Duong Hotel is an ideal spot from which to discover Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

At Hoang Duong Hotel, the excellent service and superior facilities make for an unforgettable stay. To name a few of the hotel's facilities, there are car hire.

The hotel features 15 beautifully appointed guest rooms, many of which include mirror, towels, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), desk. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Hoang Duong Hotel is a smart choice for travelers to Hanoi, offering a relaxed and hassle-free stay every time.
